artist: Artist: Barnett Freedman; Author: George Borrow; Publisher: The Limited Editions Club; Author: Introduction by Hugh Walpole
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Dorothy Millett Lindeke
description: binding: full mulberry linen, black and gold-stamped; endpapers: color-printed lithos- designes and script- on white laid paper; slip case: patern paper in salmon and black over cardboard, printed label affixed; type: Monotype Walbaum; two vols. 828 pp.
title: Lavengro Volumes I and II
